archdesc.runner: Special Collections and Archives, Johnston Memorial Library at Lindsay-Montague, Virginia State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and Archives, Johnston Memorial Library at Lindsay-Montague, Virginia State University
did.abstract: The F. Nathaniel Gatlin papers document his long and successful career at Virginia State University in Music. Gatlin served as chair of the department and was the founder of the Intercollegiate Music Association and the Petersburg Symphony.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: F. Nathaniel Gatlin Papers, Acc. #1995-71, Special Collections & Archives, Johnston Memorial Library at Lindsay-Montague, Virginia State University

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains correspondence, newspaper clipings, and information for Petersburg Symphony

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: For materials related to Gatlin's work with the Intercollegiate Music Association see the Records of Intercollegiate Music Association,Acc. #1982-45

did.physdesc: First two folders contain the Vita of F. Nathaniel Gatlin and a biographical sketch
